Fitnito is a simple yet powerful application that helps you manage your classes, clients, and passes with ease. Built with a user-friendly interface and a suite of robust features, Fitnito is perfect for gym owners looking to streamline their operations and grow their business.

The Development Journey

Fitnito was developed in late 2023 to help a local gym owner transition from an expensive and complex scheduling system to a more affordable and efficient solution. Through a smooth and collaborative development process, we were able to deliver a platform that maintained essential functionalities while significantly reducing costs.

Our team at Wemble worked closely with the gym owner to understand their needs, which allowed us to create a solution that truly meets the demands of gym management. Weâ€™re excited to share that the gyms using Fitnito have already seen remarkable results. Theyâ€™ve experienced significant time savings, fewer scheduling errors, and increased client satisfaction.
